title: Who are the 'everyday Americans' in the crowd for Trump's address?

title: Trump aims to sell 443 federal buildings, headquarters nationwide
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants to sell hundreds of federal buildings, including the FBI's J. Edgar Hoover Building headquarters.

title: House Republicans advised to stop holding in-person town halls
shortDescription: Lawmakers' in-person listening sessions have been overrun with complaints about federal DOGE cuts.

title: Trump administration tells agencies mass firings must come from them
shortDescription: The Trump administration told federal agencies that firings of probationary workers are up to the agencies ‒ not the Office of Personnel Management.

title: AOC tells followers she will not attend Trump's address to Congress
shortDescription: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio Cortez, D-New York, said on Tuesday she would be sitting out President Donald Trump’s address before a joint session of Congress.

title: AG Pam Bondi vows to purge DOJ of Trump critics
shortDescription: Bondi, in an extensive Fox News interview, provided details of the ongoing and apparently widening political purge of the Justice Department and FBI.

title: Weapons shipments to Ukraine stopped after Trump order, Pentagon says
shortDescription: All shipments of U.S. weapons to Ukraine stopped in their tracks after President Donald Trump ordered the pause on aid on Monday.

title: Trump seeks to suppress protests in college campuses by threatening funding
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that he would be cutting federal funding for colleges and schools that allow “illegal” protests.

title: Judge reinstates personnel board member fired by Trump
shortDescription: A federal judge reinstated a member of a personnel dispute board fired by the Trump administration, revealing a clash with Congress over personnel.

title: Trump DOD pick says military force an option to prevent nuclear Iran
shortDescription: Elbridge Colby told a Senate hearing that preventing Iran’s nuclear ambitions could require using US bombers and air tankers to attack Iran’s facilities.

title: Republican lawmaker introduces bill to put Donald Trump on $100 bill
shortDescription: Rep. Brandon Gill introduced a bill requiring all $100 bills to feature a picture of Donald Trump on the front face of the note.

title: Trudeau calls Trump tariffs 'dumb thing to do'
shortDescription: "We don't want this." Prime Minister Justin Trudeau placed blame for a trade war between the U.S. and Canada squarely on the Trump administration.

title: 'Trust in Trump': President's supporters dismiss alarm bells
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's voters are upholding their confidence in his controversial actions even as some await moves on his populist economic promises

title: Trump will address America. Democrats are preparing their responses.

title: 'Time to make things right': Zelenskyy says he's ready to work with Trump
shortDescription: Zelenskyy said in a social media post that it is "time to make things right" with the Trump and his administration after the Oval Office fight last week.

title: Could a GOP bill stop some married women from voting?
